event.title: was ranked number one of "New Hampshire's Most Beautiful Towns" in July 2010

data.event: The town was ranked number one of "New Hampshire's Most Beautiful Towns" in July 2010 by WMUR News 9.

event.title: was originally settled by Native Americans in 1624

data.event: Auburn was originally settled by Native Americans in 1624.
British settlers arrived in the area in 1720 and made peace with the Native Americans until the French and Indian War.

event.title: became an independent town on June 25, 1845

data.event: Auburn became an independent town on June 25, 1845, with a population of 1,200 people.
